mainboard.name: Foreboding Ruins
mainboard.oracle_text:
As Foreboding Ruins enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Swamp or Mountain card from your hand. If you don't, Foreboding Ruins enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

mainboard.name: Dragonskull Summit
mainboard.oracle_text:
Dragonskull Summit enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Mountain.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

mainboard.name: Hellion Eruption
mainboard.oracle_text: Sacrifice all creatures you control, then create that many 4/4 red Hellion creature tokens.

mainboard.name: Vampire Aristocrat
mainboard.oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Vampire Aristocrat gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

mainboard.name: Paladin of the Bloodstained
mainboard.oracle_text: When Paladin of the Bloodstained enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

mainboard.name: Kathari Bomber
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying
When Kathari Bomber deals combat damage to a player, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens and sacrifice Kathari Bomber.
Unearth {3}{B}{R} ({3}{B}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

mainboard.name: Clifftop Retreat
mainboard.oracle_text:
Clifftop Retreat enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Plains.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.

mainboard.name: Lightning Bolt
mainboard.oracle_text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

mainboard.name: Isolated Chapel
mainboard.oracle_text:
Isolated Chapel enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains or a Swamp.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.

mainboard.name: Mavren Fein, Dusk Apostle
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever one or more nontoken Vampires you control attack, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

mainboard.name: Terramorphic Expanse
mainboard.oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

mainboard.name: Orzhov Racketeers
mainboard.oracle_text:
Whenever Orzhov Racketeers deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.
Afterlife 2 (When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)

mainboard.name: Gravedigger
mainboard.oracle_text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

mainboard.name: Blinding Mage
mainboard.oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

mainboard.name: Vampire Hexmage
mainboard.oracle_text:
First strike
Sacrifice Vampire Hexmage: Remove all counters from target permanent.

mainboard.name: Scoured Barrens
mainboard.oracle_text:
Scoured Barrens enters the battlefield tapped.
When Scoured Barrens enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.

mainboard.name: Makeshift Munitions
mainboard.oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Makeshift Munitions deals 1 damage to any target.

mainboard.name: Rockslide Elemental
mainboard.oracle_text:
First strike
Whenever another creature dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Rockslide Elemental.

mainboard.name: Disfigure
mainboard.oracle_text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

mainboard.name: Liliana's Mastery
mainboard.oracle_text:
Zombies you control get +1/+1.
When Liliana's Mastery enters the battlefield, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

mainboard.name: Iona's Judgment
mainboard.oracle_text: Exile target creature or enchantment.

mainboard.name: Soul Warden
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

mainboard.name: Pacifism
mainboard.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

mainboard.name: Furycalm Snarl
mainboard.oracle_text:
As Furycalm Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Mountain or Plains card from your hand. If you don't, Furycalm Snarl enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.

mainboard.name: Ajani's Pridemate
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.

mainboard.name: Cinder Barrens
mainboard.oracle_text:
Cinder Barrens enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

mainboard.name: Gwyllion Hedge-Mage
mainboard.oracle_text:
When Gwyllion Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Plains, you may create a 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature token.
When Gwyllion Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Swamps, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

mainboard.name: Scavenger Drake
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever another creature dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Scavenger Drake.

mainboard.name: Goblin Arsonist
mainboard.oracle_text: When Goblin Arsonist dies, you may have it deal 1 damage to any target.

mainboard.name: Pitiless Pontiff
mainboard.oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Pitiless Pontiff gains deathtouch and indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

mainboard.name: Hordeling Outburst
mainboard.oracle_text: Create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

mainboard.name: Jinxed Idol
mainboard.oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, Jinxed Idol deals 2 damage to you.
Sacrifice a creature: Target opponent gains control of Jinxed Idol.
